original_text:
in which was written:
“It is reported among the nations—and Geshem says it is true—that you and the Jews are plotting to revolt, and therefore you are building the wall. Moreover, according to these reports you are about to become their king
korean_text: 그 글에 이르기를 이방 중에도 소문이 있고 가스무도 말하기를 너와 유다 사람들이 모반하려 하여 성벽을 건축한다 하나니 네가 그 말과 같이 왕이 되려 하는도다

sentences.original_text: It is reported among the nations
and Geshem says it is true
that you and the Jews are plotting to revolt
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 유대인들과 함께 반역을 계획하고 있다고

sentences.original_text: and therefore you are building the wall.
you are about to become their king
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 곧 그들의 왕이 될 것이라고
